text: @EU_Commission #EnergySecurity #RussiaUkraineGasDealWith Russia's contract to supply gas to Europe via Ukraine expiring this year, the EU could face higher energy prices next winter. The loss of gas imports could create a "worst case" scenario for countries reliant on transit through Ukraine, especially if the winter is particularly cold. It's time for the EU to accelerate its efforts to abandon Russian gas and diversify its energy sources.
